dateformat:
{{DataFormatRuby/en}}
{{Optional}} Dateformat in this language. See documentation about [http://php.net/strftime strftime() at php.net] for the syntax.
toolversionstamp: Short label stating the current version of a tool and when the last update was. $1 is the version (eg. "1.2.3-alpha") and $2 is the date (without time). {{Identical|Version}}
colon-separator: {{Optional}} Change it only if your language uses another character for ":" or it needs an extra space before the colon.
form-submit:
A general label for a form submission button. Not per se a search form!
{{Identical|Go}}
form-reset:
A general label for a form reset button. Not per se a search form!
{{Identical|Reset}}
years:
Notation of time duration (eg. "Duration: x years" ).
{{Identical|Year}}
view-source:
Label for a button or link that, when clicked, will present the program source code.
{{Identical|View source}}
comma-separator: {{Optional}} Used for separating lists of items. {{Identical|comma-separator}}
word-separator: {{Optional}} Used for separating lists of words. {{Identical|word-separator}}
and: The translation for "and" appears in the [[Special:Version]] page, between the last two items of a list. If a comma is needed, add it at the beginning without a gap between it and the "&". <nowiki> </nowiki> is a blank space, one character long. Please leave it as it is. {{Identical|And}}
